name: Zombie Tycoon
description:
Have you ever wished for a zombie outbreak your whole neighborhood turning into madness, full of brain-craving monsters? Well, you’re not alone. This is it! Z-day! The zombie formula is ready and it’s time to use it! From now on you are the Zombie Tycoon. You are at the helm of your own zombie horde and it is your job to erupt the world into mayhem. For that wonderful dream to come true, Zombie Tycoon provides you with a unique tale of intrigue and betrayal with control over three hilarious zombie squads, over 100 quirky items for your zombie horde, 10 challenging and puzzle-filled cities and a solid combat system allowing you to attack humans AND the places they call home. Prepare your weapons and sharpen your teeth because you’re up against the entire human race and there is no escape!
Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement and this item's use restrictions. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
